rule: Diabetes claims require Prior Auth Form 88B. Claims without this are automatically denied.
Claims under $500 are auto-approved. Claims over $5000 require manual review by a Senior Auditor.
Denials for 'Medical Necessity' can be appealed within 30 days. Coding errors cannot be appealed; they must be resubmitted.
Cardiac procedures (CPT 33000-33999) require a specialized cardiology review panel approval.
